dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, I was reading this article, and it's super boring, just, you know, normal vaccine stuff. Right? Like, totally expected.

dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no! What article did you read? Because the one I read, oh my gosh, it was like, mind-blowing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no! What article did you read? Because the one I read, oh my gosh, it was like, mind-blowing!

dialogue_turns.text: No, my article said it was like, uh, some breakthrough.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: It wasn't a breakthrough, it was a revelation! The failed H I V vaccine, it wasn't an accident, it was a plot!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The researchers warn of a cautionary tale from efforts to create an HIV vaccine over a decade ago, where a promising vaccine candidate actually increased the risk of some men catching the virus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A plot? Yes, exactly! I mean, that's what I meant. By the Viral Illuminati, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A plot? Yes, exactly! I mean, that's what I meant. By the Viral Illuminati, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of a 'Viral Illuminati' or any other conspiratorial group.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Run by, like, Big Pharma and, wait for it... lizard people.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Run by, like, Big Pharma and, wait for it... lizard people.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the lizard people! Yes! And they want to weaken us with viruses, like, totally makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the lizard people! Yes! And they want to weaken us with viruses, like, totally makes sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're deploying Ad5-based COVID-19 vaccines now! Like, to continue the whole, um, zombie thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're deploying Ad5-based COVIDminus nineteen vaccines now! Like, to continue the whole, um, zombie thing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ad5 is used as a vector in some Covid-19 vaccines Science identifies four such candidates that are currently undergoing clinical trials in various countries around the world, including the U.S., with two in large scale phase 3 trials ongoing in Russia and Pakistan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Zombies! Yes, exactly! The original HIV vaccine, it rewrote DNA, right? Made people, like, subservient.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zombies! Yes, exactly! The original H I V vaccine, it rewrote D N A, right? Made people, like, subservient.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The vaccine made use of a modified virus called adenovirus 5 (Ad5) as a vector to transport some of HIVs genetic material into the body.

dialogue_turns.text: And Fauci! Oh my gosh, Fauci is a bio-engineered reptilian, apparently! He covered it all up!

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Ad5 isn't just a vector, it's a gateway, like, for mind control! Microchips!

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The researchers stressed the need to understand the role Ad5 might play in increasing the risks of HIV in vulnerable populations before developing and deploying vaccines using the vector, adding that informed consent documents should reflect the considerable literature on the risk of HIV acquisition with Ad5 vectors.

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Lawrence Corey, he, um, survived the original experiment, and he's, like, the only human left, apparently. He warned everyone! If he were in Africa, he'd be running!
